description: An issue was discovered in Samsung Mobile Processor, Wearable Processor Exynos Exynos 980, Exynos 850, Exynos 1080, Exynos 1280, Exynos 1380, Exynos 1330, Exynos 1480, Exynos W920, Exynos W930. In the function slsi_rx_scan_done_ind(), there is no input validation check on a length coming from userspace, which can lead to a potential heap over-read.
